title: JFR deadlocks
body:
Hi,
init of  `io.netty.buffer.ReturnChunkEvent`  causes class initialization deadlock. JDK fixed it in [Java 26](https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8368670), but I think on Netty side it would be solved by replacing
type of ` io.netty.buffer.ReturnChunkEvent#INSTANCE` from `FreeChunkEvent` to `ReturnChunkEvent` so `ReturnChunkEvent` would not be referencing other JFR type during init. 

